 DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN (ColorDrawer)

Detailed Description

A specialized Drawer that fills the Canvas with a specified color.

It can be defined in an XML file with the <color> element.

Definition at line 20 of file ColorDrawer.h.

void gaia::graphics::ColorDrawer::draw ( Canvas *  canvas) [virtual]

Draw in its bounds (set via setBounds) respecting optional effects such as alpha (set via setAlpha) and color filter (set via setColorFilter).

Parameters:
canvasThe canvas to draw into

Implements gaia::graphics::Drawer.

int32_t gaia::graphics::ColorDrawer::getAlpha ( ) const

Returns the alpha value of this drawer's color.

Returns:
A value between 0 and 255.

Gets the drawer's color value.

Returns:
The color to draw.
int32_t gaia::graphics::ColorDrawer::getOpacity ( ) const [virtual]

Return the opacity/transparency of this Drawer.

Generally a Drawer should be as conservative as possible with the value it returns. For example, if it contains multiple child drawers and only shows one of them at a time.

Note that the returned value does not take into account a custom alpha that has been applied by the client through the setAlpha methods.

Returns:
int32_t The opacity class of the Drawer.

Implements gaia::graphics::Drawer.

void gaia::graphics::ColorDrawer::setAlpha ( int32_t  alpha) [virtual]

Sets the color's alpha value.

Parameters:
alphaThe alpha value to set, between 0 and 255.

Implements gaia::graphics::Drawer.

void gaia::graphics::ColorDrawer::setColor ( int32_t  color)

Sets the drawer's color value.

This action will clobber the results of prior calls to #setAlpha(int) on this object, which side-affected the underlying color.

void gaia::graphics::ColorDrawer::setColorFilter ( const ColorFilter *  colorFilter) [virtual]

Setting a color filter on a ColorDrawer has no effect.

Parameters:
colorFilterIgnore.

Implements gaia::graphics::Drawer.
